MeanShiftSmoothing|fout
This application smooths an image using the MeanShift algorithm.
Image Filtering
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|in|Input Image|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|fout|Spectral filtered output|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|foutpos|Spatial filtered displacement output|None|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|spatialr|Spatial radius|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|5|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|ranger|Range radius|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|15|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|thres|Mode convergence threshold|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0.1|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|maxiter|Maximum number of iterations|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|100|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|rangeramp|Range radius ramp coefficient|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterBoolean|modesearch|Mode search|false|True
*QgsProcessingParameterEnum|outputpixeltype|Output pixel type|uint8;int;float;double|False|2|True
